statements: SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM UserCredentials WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserCredentials ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM UserCredentials WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM UserCredentials WHERE password_hash = 'h4shP@$$w0rd';
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserCredentials WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserCredentials WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM UserCredentials;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, last_login FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, secret_question FROM user_secret WHERE secret_answer = 'example';
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, secret_question FROM user_secret WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE last_login IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM password_reset WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY expiration_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS attempt_count FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT u.username, l.attempt_time FROM users u INNER JOIN login_attempts l ON u.user_id = l.user_id WHERE l.success = false;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY attempt_time DESC;
SELECT id, token FROM password_reset_tokens WHERE is_valid = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT id, username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, password_reset_tokens.token FROM users JOIN password_reset_tokens ON users.id = password_reset_tokens.user_id;
SELECT users.id, COUNT(login_attempts.id) AS login_attempts_count FROM users LEFT JOIN login_attempts ON users.id = login_attempts.user_id GROUP BY users.id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';

SELECT user_id, user_permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_permissions_mappings ON users.user_id = user_permissions_mappings.user_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_permissions_mappings.permission_id = user_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles_mappings urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions_mappings upm ON u.user_id = upm.user_id JOIN user_permissions p ON upm.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles_mappings urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions_mappings upm ON u.user_id = upm.user_id JOIN user_permissions p ON upm.permission_id = p.permission_id;
